name: Wood for the Trees
description:
Wood for the Trees is a personal adventure game created for Ludum Dare 35. You might enjoy it more if you take your time, and read the texts.

Music was done for the game prototype "Omertà" some years ago, by my brothers Johannes-Paul and Ludwig Hanisch. The trees were generated with HappyTree by Sol_HSA, and the used font is "Bree Serif". Unfortunately I didn't have time to add sound effects, sorry.
